description: This file is an HTML source file for a web-based database viewer interface. It contains HTML markup, embedded CSS styles for layout and design, and JavaScript code for fetching database information, displaying databases, tables, and table data, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets the current selection, and updates the interface.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database and loads the tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a given database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table, limiting results to 50 records.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and inserts HTML for the data table based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cell content, handling different data types and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncate for long content.
